body_text:
@MattGrimes reported that he couldn't submit the recipe form on multiple occasions, and he confirmed that he keeps the admin interface open in a tab for days at a time. I suspect his session is timing out.
I talked with @mythmon about this, and he recommended just having the client refresh its session periodically so that, to the user, it appears that their session never times out.

title: Long-lived sessions cannot update recipes
body:
@MattGrimes reported that he couldn't submit the recipe form on multiple occasions, and he confirmed that he keeps the admin interface open in a tab for days at a time. I suspect his session is timing out.

I talked with @mythmon about this, and he recommended just having the client refresh its session periodically so that, to the user, it appears that their session never times out.
